attributes.action: UK to initiate a vote in NATO on whether to close the Ukranian skies
attributes.additional_details: The Russia invaded Ukraine on 24 February 2022 starting the war. The Ukraine does not have an effective anti-rocket defence system. Over 2000 civilians have died in 5 days. NATO has the forces to save the Ukrainians. UK and US are signatory to the Budapest Memorandum and gave a "political commitment" of security assurances to Ukraine when Ukraine gave up nuclear weapons.
attributes.background: UK government, please initiate a vote at NATO to exercise NATO capabilities to close the Ukrainian skies and vote in favour of this

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
